title: Gold Coast Two-Hour Private Yacht Charter for up to Eight Guests with Champagne & Grazing Board
description:
Cruise down the beautiful Gold Coast Broadwater in style with a two-hour luxury yacht charter, exclusively for your group of up to eight guests. Start the experience at Mariner’s Cove Marina, where you'll board either the opulent YOT Blue or YOT 75 - both designed to impress and decked out with entertainment areas, ocean deck bars and an attentive, expert crew. 

As you soak in the gorgeous views, sip on Moët & Chandon Brut Impérial champagne and enjoy a deluxe grazing board filled with a selection of premium cheeses, cured meats, tasty dips, lavosh crackers, olives and more. Relax in comfort as your yacht is expertly navigated along the waters, and revel in this amazing opportunity to take in the breathtaking coastline in unparalleled luxury.
offer_address: Mariner’s Cove Marina, Main Beach, Arm C, Gold Coast, Queensland
